hero.title: Cloud Engineer
hero.description: I'm a cloud engineer with background in software engineering, passionate about creating scalable and efficient solutions. I work with AWS, infrastructure as code, and automation to optimize applications and reduce costs. My focus is on building and maintaining secure, resilient environments prepared for high performance and continuous operation. Here you can find some of my projects, my resume and more about me.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A well-designed cloud scales, reduces costs, and improves reliability. Good architecture practices and automation make the difference.
projects.descriptionTerraform: Implementation of a complete and automated infrastructure on AWS using Terraform for provisioning, which includes VPC, ALB, EC2, Auto Scaling, database, and security configurations. The Terraform state is stored in S3 and DynamoDB, allowing versioning, encryption, concurrency locking, and high availability of the backend. The project ensures a scalable, secure, and easily reproducible environment, integrating infrastructure as code (IaC) and automation for greater efficiency.
projects.descriptionLambda: Serverless application for real-time analysis using AWS CloudTrail, Lambda, S3, and EventBridge. Automatically aggregates and processes CloudTrail logs to generate comprehensive insights into AWS account activities, security events, and resource utilization patterns through real-time data processing and multi-format reporting.
projects.descriptionCodeFlow: Automated CI/CD pipeline using AWS CodePipeline and GitHub Actions to integrate, test, and deploy applications efficiently. The project ensures continuous deliveries, automated builds, and secure deployments in AWS.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a cloud engineer with background in software engineering, passionate about creating scalable and efficient solutions. I work with AWS, infrastructure as code, and automation to optimize applications and reduce costs. My focus is on building secure, resilient environments prepared for high performance and continuous operation.
about.description2: I am always willing to learn and believe that, regardless of the technology, it is possible to master any tool or concept with dedication and practice. For me, adaptability and continuous learning are essential in the technology field.
about.description3: Beyond technology, I'm fascinated by traveling and exploring off-the-beaten-path places, I love reading and I love cats. By the way, The Name of the Wind is the best book ever written.

coursesAndCertifications.title: Courses and Certifications
coursesAndCertifications.description: Currently, I am a student of Software Engineering at PUC Minas, with a graduation date in 2026. My education provides a solid foundation in system architecture, software development, and engineering practices focused on cloud computing.
coursesAndCertifications.description2: I am also certified as AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate (SAA-C03), a certification that validates my knowledge in scalable, secure, and high-performance architecture in AWS.
coursesAndCertifications.description3: I am always seeking improvement and my goal is to continue expanding my expertise, obtaining new certifications, and improving my ability to design efficient, secure, and scalable solutions in the cloud.
